OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord degree hepatic dysfunction ( moderate [ bilirubin ≤ 3 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) ] v severe [ bilirubin > 3 time ≤ 6 time ULN ] ) . Patients receive oral sorafenib tosylate twice daily day 1-28 . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo hepatic scintigraphy technetium Tc 99m mebrofinin ( MEB ) technetium Tc 99m sestamibi ( MIBI ) baseline . Blood urine sample collect periodically pharmacokinetic study . After completion study therapy , patient follow 3-4 week every 3 month thereafter .
